summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending page 76 of the Official Land Use Map, (Volume 1 of Plats, page 238, Records of King County) to rezone property located at 3333 Wallingford Avenue North, from Industrial-Commercial with a 45' height limit (IC-45) to Neighborhood Commercial Two with a 65' height limit (NC2-65) and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Tomlinson, Inc., C.F. 305371, Application. 2105167)
